nodes.documentation:
Auction interface definition - event and method definitions
* https://www.knownorigin.io/
nodes.name: IAuction

nodes.documentation:
@title Artists accepting bidding contract for KnownOrigin (KODA)
* Rules:
Can only bid for an edition which is enabled
Can only add new bids higher than previous highest bid plus minimum bid amount
Can increase your bid, only if you are the top current bidder
Once outbid, original bidder has ETH returned
Cannot double bid once you are already the highest bidder, can only call increaseBid()
Only the defined controller address can accept the bid
If a bid is revoked, the auction remains open however no highest bid exists
If the contract is Paused, no public actions can happen e.g. bids, increases, withdrawals
Managers of contract have full control over it act as a fallback in-case funds go missing or errors are found
On accepting of any bid, funds are split to KO and Artists - optional 3rd party split not currently supported
If an edition is sold out, the auction is stopped, manual refund required by bidder or owner
Upon cancelling a bid which is in flight, funds are returned and contract stops further bids on the edition
Artists commissions and address are pulled from the KODA contract and are not based on the controller address
* Scenario:
1) Config artist (Dave) & edition (1000)
2) Bob places a bid on edition 1000 for 1 ETH
3) Alice places a higher bid of 1.5ETH, overriding Bobs position as the leader, sends Bobs 1 ETH back and taking 1st place
4) Dave accepts Alice's bid
5) KODA token generated and transferred to Alice, funds are split between KO and Artist
* https://www.knownorigin.io/
* BE ORIGINAL. BUY ORIGINAL.
nodes.name: ArtistAcceptingBids

nodes.name: placeBid

nodes.documentation:
@dev Public method for increasing your bid, reverts if:
- Contract is Paused
- Edition provided is not valid
- Edition provided is not configured for auctions
- Edition provided is sold out
- msg.sender is not the current highest bidder
@return true on success

acceptBid(uint256).details: Method for accepting the highest bid, only called by edition creator, reverts if: - Contract is Paused - msg.sender is not the edition controller - Edition provided is not validMints a new token in KODA contractSplits bid amount to KO and Artist, based on KODA contract defined valuesRemoves current highest bid so there is no current highest bidderIf no more editions are available the auction is stopped

auctionDetails(uint256).details: Look up all the known data about the latest edition bidding roundReturns zeros for all values when not valid

cancelAuction(uint256).details: Method for cancelling an auction, only called from contract ownerrefunds previous highest bidders bidremoves current highest bid so there is no current highest bidder

disableEdition(uint256).details: Disables the edition for auctionsOnly callable from owner

editionController(uint256).details: Check which address can action a bid for the given edition

enableEdition(uint256).details: Enables the edition for auctionsOnly callable from owner

highestBidForEdition(uint256).details: Look up all the current highest bidder for the latest editionReturns zeros for all values when not valid

increaseBid(uint256).details: Public method for increasing your bid, reverts if: - Contract is Paused - Edition provided is not valid - Edition provided is not configured for auctions - Edition provided is sold out - msg.sender is not the current highest bidder

isEditionEnabled(uint256).details: Check an edition is enabled for auction

manualDeleteEditionBids(uint256,address).details: Manual override method removing bidding valuesOnly callable from owner

manualOverrideEditionHighestBidAndBidder.details: Manual override method for setting edition highest bid & the highest bidder to the provided addressOnly callable from owner

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

placeBid(uint256).details: Public method for placing a bid, reverts if: - Contract is Paused - Edition provided is not valid - Edition provided is not configured for auctions - Edition provided is sold out - msg.sender is already the highest bidder - msg.value is not greater than highest bid + minimum amountrefunds the previous bidders ether if the bid is overwritten

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setArtistsControlAddress(uint256,address.details: Sets the edition artist control addressOnly callable from owner

setArtistsControlAddressAndEnabledEditio.details: Sets the edition artist control address and enables the edition for auctionOnly callable from owner

setKoCommissionAccount(address).details: Sets the KODA addressOnly callable from owner

setKodavV2(address).details: Sets the KODA addressOnly callable from owner

setMinBidAmount(uint256).details: Sets the minimum bid amountOnly callable from owner

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

withdrawBid(uint256).details: Public method for withdrawing your bid, reverts if: - Contract is Paused - msg.sender is not the current highest bidderremoves current highest bid so there is no current highest bidder

withdrawStuckEther(address).details: Allows for the ability to extract ether so we can distribute to the correct bidders accordinglyOnly callable from owner

withdrawStuckEtherOfAmount(address,uint2.details: Allows for the ability to extract specific ether amounts so we can distribute to the correct bidders accordinglyOnly callable from owner

devdoc.title: Artists accepting bidding contract for KnownOrigin (KODA) * Rules: Can only bid for an edition which is enabled Can only add new bids higher than previous highest bid plus minimum bid amount Can increase your bid, only if you are the top current bidder Once outbid, original bidder has ETH returned Cannot double bid once you are already the highest bidder, can only call increaseBid() Only the defined controller address can accept the bid If a bid is revoked, the auction remains open however no highest bid exists If the contract is Paused, no public actions can happen e.g. bids, increases, withdrawals Managers of contract have full control over it act as a fallback in-case funds go missing or errors are found On accepting of any bid, funds are split to KO and Artists - optional 3rd party split not currently supported If an edition is sold out, the auction is stopped, manual refund required by bidder or owner Upon cancelling a bid which is in flight, funds are returned and contract stops further bids on the edition Artists commissions and address are pulled from the KODA contract and are not based on the controller address * Scenario: 1) Config artist (Dave) & edition (1000) 2) Bob places a bid on edition 1000 for 1 ETH 3) Alice places a higher bid of 1.5ETH, overriding Bobs position as the leader, sends Bobs 1 ETH back and taking 1st place 4) Dave accepts Alice's bid 5) KODA token generated and transferred to Alice, funds are split between KO and Artist * https://www.knownorigin.io/ * BE ORIGINAL. BUY ORIGINAL.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
